5. To compare the time effectively, we need to convert all times into a uniform format that can be compared numerically. In this case, we will convert the times from hh:mm to minutes (hours * 60 + minutes). So, 3:02 becomes 182 minutes.

7. Compare the time found for game 4 (182 minutes) with the times of other games.
